title: Name Change not in (new client) store?

replies.body: I changed my name earlier today by loading up the old client. It's still there, or at least it was for me
Name Change and Server transfer are currently disabled.  We will likely have them up and running for you guys in the next patch or two.  Stay tuned!

Don't worry I found it using the 'legacy' client. When will server transfers be back up? I'm moving to the states so I'm gonna have to transfer to NA but that's much later in the year

EDIT: Also, where will the name change be? Will it be in the 'Accessories' or 'Account'? I'm guessing 'Account'?
